summary: Interactive 3D cafe website with a contour-line themed design, smooth animations, mobile-friendly navigation, and pages for Menu, About Us, Contact Us, plus a page to download/export the site for later import into WordPress and editing with Elementor.
architectural_notes: Prioritize mobile/tablet usability for 3D navigation and interactive elements.
Content can be placeholders initially (menu/about/contact) and designed to be easily replaceable later.
Export/download workflow required to support later WordPress import and Elementor-based editing.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Seamless contour-line pattern background, subtle and low-contrast (contour-pattern.dim_2048x2048.png)
- Hero background illustration combining cafe ambiance with contour-line aesthetic (cafe-hero-contour.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Create a mobile-friendly interactive 3D cafe room experience on the Home page using Three.js (React Three Fiber), allowing users to explore/navigate the interior with simple controls that work on phone and tablet (e.g., drag to look, pinch/scroll to zoom, and an easy-to-use on-screen navigation option).

Apply a consistent contour-line visual theme across the entire site, including a coherent color palette (non-blue/purple by default) and typography, and ensure the theme is used consistently in layout, backgrounds, and UI elements.

Add smooth, sitewide animations that enhance interactivity while keeping navigation easy (e.g., page transitions, hover/tap micro-interactions, subtle parallax/ambient motion, and gentle 3D scene ambient animation).
Implement core site pages with placeholder content in English: Home (3D room), Menu, About Us, and Contact Us; include a persistent navigation header and a mobile-friendly menu.

Add an Export/Download page that provides a downloadable package of the website intended for later WordPress import/editing; include clear on-page instructions (in English) describing what the download contains and general steps the user can take to use it with WordPress/Elementor.

Add minimal backend support (Motoko, single actor) only if needed for the Export/Download workflow (e.g., returning metadata/version info); otherwise keep the app frontend-only for content and interactions.

Add a lightweight, accessible layout system that keeps content readable over the contour-line theme (contrast, spacing, responsive breakpoints), including a footer with placeholder business details and links to core pages.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an interactive, mobile-friendly 3D room experience for a cafe website (user can navigate the interior space).
Apply a contour-line visual theme with a cohesive, good-looking color palette across the site.
Add smooth sitewide animations/interactions while keeping navigation easy and usable on mobile/tablet.
Build core site pages: Menu, About Us, Contact Us (use placeholder content initially).
Add an extra page that lets the user download/export the website for import into WordPress and editing via Elementor.
Ensure the project structure is suitable for later WordPress import and ongoing editing using Elementor.

projectName: Interactive 3D cafe website with contour-line theme, animations, core pages, and export/download page
